title: Yield Farming
description: A quick, practical guide to Yield Farming.

hook.text: Yield farming is the art of moving crypto between protocols to maximize returns. DeFi's version of a savings game.

buildup.text: Protocols offered sky-high interest rates to attract users. Some advertised 1,000% annual returns.

discovery.text: Farmers deposited funds, earned governance tokens as rewards, and reinvested those tokens for compound gains.

twist.text: Most high yields were temporary â€” funded by token inflation, not real revenue. When rewards stopped, users left.

climax.text: Yield farming attracted billions into DeFi. It also created a mercenary user base that chased rewards, not loyalty.

punchline.text: Thousand-percent yields sound great until you learn where they come from.

quiz.question: Why did most DeFi yield farming returns eventually decline?
options: High yields were funded by token inflation, not real revenue
